en.content: You put up a spirited resistance, but the man’s bulk and determination wear you down. Finally he lands a crushing blow and you drop. Blackness floods in.
Later, you are dimly aware of your legs being lifted and your back scraping against the ground as you are dragged off.

zh.content: 你勇敢地抵抗，但这男人的块头和决心还是压服了你。最后他打出一记重拳，你摔倒在地，眼前顿时一片黑暗。
过了一会儿，你朦朦胧胧地感觉到你的两腿被人抬着，后背刮蹭地面，就像被人拖着走一样。

text.content: 你可以回复 1 点耐久值。
